decision_conditions: <p class="MsoNormal">The development hereby granted will not be occupied until a) details showing the bat and/or bird boxes are installed on the exterior of the main walls, and b) details of sensitive external lighting to benefit nocturnal wildlife, has been submitted to, and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The created and/or enhanced habitat items in the above shall be managed and maintained in accordance with approved Preliminary Ecological Appraisal dated 7th October 2024.</p><p class="MsoNormal"><br></p>

The erection of fencing for the protection of any retained tree shall be undertaken in accordance with the approved Tree Report (Ref: S1334-J1-R1) and particulars before any equipment, machinery or materials are brought on to the site for the purposes of the development, and shall be maintained until all equipment, machinery and surplus materials have been removed from the site.  Nothing shall be stored or placed in any area fenced in accordance with this condition, and the ground levels within those areas shall not be altered, nor shall any excavation be made, without the written consent of the local planning authority.
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no windows / doors, other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the flank elevations of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.

The first floor windows in the flank elevations of the proposed development shall:
(a) be of purpose-made obscure glass,
(b) be permanently fixed closed below a height of 1.7m above finished floor level,
and shall thereafter be retained in that form.

The materials including brick bond to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby
permitted shall match those used in the existing building.&nbsp;
description: Two storey rear extension; Rooflights in side and rear elevations,  Alterations to front porch, Patio at Rear, External alterations (Demolition of attached garage, rear extension and front entrance canopy)
